channel.title: 金融时报

item.title: 英国《金融时报》独家报道：美国国会独立财政监督机构负责人警告说，美国债务正处于 "史无前例 "的轨道上，可能会导致李斯-特鲁斯式的市场震荡
item.description:
FT Exclusive: US debt is on an 'unprecedented' trajectory that could lead to a Liz Truss-style market shock, the head of Congress’s independent fiscal watchdog has warned https://t.co/JLiKKeQE9z pic.twitter.com/ljX3OpInL1

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 印度 9.68 亿合格选民将在六周内投票。反对党称这一漫长的选举过程有利于纳伦德拉-莫迪，@JohnReedwrites 写道
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国《金融时报》编辑部撰文指出，俄罗斯正在哀悼上周五摇滚音乐会恐怖袭击事件中至少137人的死亡，其中包括几名儿童。
item.description:
Russia is mourning the deaths of at least 137 people, including several children, in last Friday’s horrific terrorist attack on a rock concert, writes the FT editorial board https://t.co/eb2VpumtEx pic.twitter.com/CfA3uDS7fM

— Financial Times (@FT) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国起诉书指控该组织向联邦政府官员发送了 1 万多封带有隐藏跟踪链接的 "恶意 "电子邮件
item.description:
The US indictment alleges that the group sent more than 10,000 ‘malicious’ emails with hidden tracking links to officials across the federal government https://t.co/029zS4AWmR pic.twitter.com/LH3WHq0lGD

item.title: 总部位于休斯敦的全球最大油田服务集团 SLB 表示，尽管乌克兰发生了战争，但该公司没有离开俄罗斯的计划。其最大的竞争对手贝克休斯和哈里伯顿在 2022 年出售了公司 @金融时报 via @ft @mylesmccormick_
item.description:
World's biggest oilfield services group Houston-based SLB says it has no plans to leave Russia despite the the war in Ukraine. Its biggest rivals Baker Hughes and Halliburton sold up in 2022 @FinancialTimes https://t.co/DI9d2icDdA via @ft @mylesmccormick_

— Jamie Smyth (@JamieSmythF) March 25, 2024
